subject: file diff extension
msgSnippet: Some of the guys from netbeans.org developed a JUnit file diff extension as part of their efforts to integrate JUnit with their IDE. It looks very nice, and is
messageBody:
Some of the guys from netbeans.org developed a JUnit file diff extension as
part of their efforts to integrate JUnit with their IDE. It looks very nice,
and is well architected. I haven't seen anybody talk about it, so I'll
provide the links.

See the page: http://junit.netbeans.org/JUnit_installation.html and look for
the "extensions" link, which is in the section labeled "Dependencies". The
link is http://junit.netbeans.org/download/junit-file-diff.zip - My browser
doesn't seem to like retrieving this file directly from the zip file link.


Has anyone had any experience with using this? Are there any other
extensions like this floating around?


Bill Laird
